pacman
Interface PacManPlayer

All Known Implementing Classes:
BestMinimaxPacManPlayer, DFSPacManPlayer, KeyboardPacManPlayer, MinimaxPacManPlayer, PacManGUI, SimplePacManPlayer
public interface PacManPlayer

An interface for classes that can choose Pac-Man's moves, conditioned on the history and the ghost players.

Method Summary
 Move chooseMove(Game game)
          Chooses a Move for Pac-Man in the Game.
